p:
Figure S3 shows the calculated lattice constants and unit cell volume as a function of Tb 3+ content. Lattice constants a, b and c calculated by Jade. It is clearly seen that the lattice constants a, b, and c decrease with increasing Tb 3+ content, and the unit cell volume can be calculated as:
